problem.markdown: Which of the following are among the seven principles of the Army's approach to physical readiness training (ADP 7-0)? [x] Train to standard [ ] Train for alertness [x] Train to sustain [ ] Train with equipment [x] Train to Develop Agile Leaders and Organizations
problem.p: Which of the following are among the seven principles of the Army's approach to physical readiness training (ADP 7-0)?

checkboxgroup.choice: Train to Develop Agile Leaders and Organizations
